title: Barcode and QR code Reader with Python
description: In this article, I will walk you through how to make a barcode and Qr code reader with Python and Machine Learning. This is a great machine learning task to get started with computer vision.Barcodes and QR codes are very cool and interesting because they store information in a different format. The fun part about them is that we can’t tell what they are storing until we analyze them. It’s like playing a puzzle game. And another thing I love about them is that they can be part of the physical world and still connect us to the internet world.Also, Read – Machine Learning Full Course for free.
